title: Among Us
description: An online and local party game of teamwork and betrayal for 4-15 players...in space!

title: God of War II
description: a third-person action-adventure video game where the player controls the vengeful anti-hero Kratos

title: God of War
description: a highly acclaimed action-adventure video game franchise known for its brutal combat and a story centered on the Spartan warrior Kratos

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: an open-world, action-adventure RPG where you play as V, a mercenary in the dystopian, neon-drenched metropolis of Night City

title: Left 4 Dead 2
description: a cooperative first-person shooter horror game where four survivors fight zombies and special infected through the Deep South

title: Asus TUF Gaming A15 FA507NUR-LP051W | 15.6 144Hz | Ryzen 7 7435HS | 16GB RAM | 512GB SSD | RTX 4050 6GB | WIN 11 Home | PC Central
description: A gaming laptp with a 15.6-inch 144Hz display, and AMD Ryzen 7 7435HS processor, 16GB of DDR5 RAM, and a 512GB NVMe SSD.It features an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4050 6GB graphics card for gaming and includes a 12-month warranty and Windows 11 Home.
